data.title: How much do Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd is estimated to be approximate $88,107 per year. The majority pay is between $77,578 to $99,478 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd salary, Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd pay rate, and more.
data.text:
1. How much does Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd in the United States pay?

Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd pays its employees an average of $88,107 per year. The average salary at Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd range from $77,578 to $99,478 per year.

2. Do Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd is lesser than Winonics Inc. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd is $99,478 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Winonics Inc is $117,878 per year.

3. How much does Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd pay compared to Winonics Inc?

The average annual salary at Murata Manufacturing Co Ltd is $88,107, or an hourly wage of $42, in comparison to Winonics Inc which pays $104,404 per year or $50 per hour.
